name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder
name_original: 12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder
description:
The noble citizens of Rhodes called brave Hercules for help. They needed his strength to build an enormous statue of great Helios, their god and protector. Hercules decided to fulfil that request and started working. It turns out that our strong hero is an amazing builder capable of implementing any challenging project. His passion for construction work was growing day by day presenting to Hellas new wonders.



Why should anyone not be happy about this? Hades, Charon and the Minotaur have their own reasons to wish Hercules to be stopped. They are going to destroy everything the hero created at any cost!



Will famous Hercules be able to build and protect the Wonders of the World, overcome the obstacles and defeat the equally strong rival? Play “12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder”, and find it out!



  • Accompany Hercules with a new Game Speed setting!
  • Explore sublevels, bonus levels, super bonus levels and extra super-bonus levels!
  • Interactive guide
  • Wallpapers
  • Additional bonus levels
  • Hercules and the skyscraper
